subject: Testing Abstract classes, private methods?
msgSnippet: Hi, I m new to JUnit. Could anybody tell me how to test abstract classes? How to test private methods in a class? Thanks in advance. Ajit.
messageBody:
Hi,

I'm new to JUnit. Could anybody tell me how to test abstract classes?
How to test private methods in a class?

Thanks in advance.
Ajit.
